properties.name: app.configService.port
properties.description: The port of Config Service to which we have to connect

properties.name: app.configService.apiVersion
properties.description: The Config Service API version we have to use

properties.name: app.configSource
properties.description: The root configuration bucket used by the application

properties.name: jetty.worker-threads
properties.description: The number of worker threads for Jetty

properties.name: statsd.prefix
properties.description: The prefix to be attached to all metrics pushed through statsd

properties.name: statsd.host
properties.description: The host on which the statsd daemon is running. Typically localhost

properties.name: statsd.port
properties.description: The port on which the statsd daemon is listening

properties.name: statsd.push-interval-seconds
properties.description: Frequency in seconds of pushing metrics data to statsd

properties.name: periodic-health-check.fixed-delay-ms
properties.description: The frequency in milliseconds with which the deep health check should be run
